divs: sighting detailson a clear , crisp night my brother and i drove to pittsburg north on i-79 from wv. it was a trip we had made many times. we had just gone a few miles in pa. when i noticed a very bright light low on the left horizon. i studied it and i had my brother look carefully at it . he thought it was a plane and i had the erie feeling it was a ufo. the twists and turns in the road made us lose sight of it and then we could see it again...i said again to my brother it was a ufo and he rejected the idea...suddenly as i looked to the left a streak of light shot by..i said "did you see that?" he replied "yeah"... we drove on and we could see the light low on the horizon agin..then we went around another curve and lost sight of it...i was getting excited and suddenly on the left (south bound) side of the interstate i could see a very bright light hovering over the road, about a hundred feet up and cars were passing beneath it ...i yelled to my brother to look at it and i took the wheel of the car as he studied it...we fixed on that as we continued down the road at about 60mph...at abot the 18 mile marker we entered a long straightaway....odd for this trip....and on the left , low on the horizon i could see the bright light we had first started watching... it was slowly travelling perpendicular to us and i realized we were going to meet this light farther up the highway... i told my brother to drive faster to intersect it...slowly it approached...and quickly we sped to meet it..excitement filled the air, and as we got close to it we could make out 2 headlights and a red and a blue light on each side.. it was almost on top of us now and i told my brother to pull off the road...! we did and the ship came over top of us and suddenly stopped! oh [cms\tg\pid]!!! i rolled down the window and stuck my head outside the car...my brother looked at it from the drivers seat.. i said to him.."it's tiangle shaped!" he replied it was a triangle with its corners cut off and this in indeed what i had seen but i was not trying to be specific as he was..i yelled to him to listen for a sound..there was only a soft humming noise....i said to call out details ...we could see a main fuselage.. a silvery gray color...no markings... a line crossing the back section horizontally..we tried to communicate telepathically with it...crazy huh?...but it was indeed a crazy situation...then suddenly it slowly turned on its axis and presented me with a view of a tail section that was lit up..my brother later told me he had not seen this tail section as he was still in the car and i had a better view....it stayed like this for a while...time seemed to be irrelevant...and then it slowly went back from the direction it had come...slowly...maybe 15mph...i slipped back into the car and my brother was inshock...i said" man i can't believe we saw a ufo!" he replied over and over , shacking his head in disbelief..."no, no,no, no" " oh man"...we sat in the car and just shook as if frozen, shaking like a leaf.....we were stunned... we tried to contact the airport when we returned to pittsburg later but it was futile...a few days later i told some people about hte incident and a few days more went by when a girl i had told said she read about the sighting in a newspaper and that 30 other people had seen it that night....this is totally a true stry...i have told the story many times...and 30 years later i still get a rush from the thought of it and i can clearly see the whole thing in my head..
